properties.areaDesc: James River from Jamestown to the James River Bridge
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued January 19 at 3:55AM EST until January 20 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Wakefield VA
properties.description:
* WHAT...Northwest winds 15 to 20 kt with gusts up to 25 kt and
waves 1 to 2 ft expected from this afternoon through tonight.

* WHERE...James River from Jamestown to the James River Bridge.

* WHEN...From 4 PM Sunday to 7 AM EST Monday.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 4 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 7 AM EST MONDAY
